author: Joan Herrera
comment: Its good when it works, but is really annoying when you put your info to sign in and you choose to save your sign in and the next time you sign back up you gotta puy all the information again and again and again even the security code smh. Very annoying app

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content: We're sorry to hear that. We pride ourselves on having a nationally acclaimed app. Can you email some specifics as to what went wrong for you at mobileapp@usalliance.org. We are anxious to hear your story so we can make it right

author: Theresa Trujillo
comment: I can not get the app on my phone. Each time I close out I have to go back in the play store to open to my account

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content: We're sorry to hear that. We pride ourselves on having a nationally acclaimed app. Can you email some specifics as to what went wrong for you at marketing@usalliance.org. We are anxious to hear your story so we can make it right.

author: Emily holder
comment: Convenient and easy to use. Everything I need to find is easily accessible. Love being able to check my credit score each month.
title: I love usalliance and I love their app.

author: CHILL iAM
comment: Too many issues with transferring funds across accounts

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content: We're sorry to hear that. We pride ourselves on having a nationally acclaimed app. Can you email some specifics as to what went wrong for you at mobileapp@usalliance.org. We are anxious to hear your story so we can make it right.

author: Jessel Alonso
comment: This App is better then the rest absolutely love it and love USALLIANCE
title: Best Banking App!

comment: app on Android not as good on apple iOS

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content: We're sorry to hear that. We pride ourselves on having a nationally acclaimed app. Can you email some specifics as to what went wrong for you at marketing@usalliance.org. We are anxious to hear your story so we can make it right.

title: not good

author: Margaret Riccardelli
comment: After the update, I can no longer see transaction data for my account.

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content: Hi Margaret. If you may, please call Member Services at 800-431-2754 so we can better assist in resolving this issue. Thank you.

title: No Transaction Data

author: Lesly Francois
comment: I HOPE WE'VE HOPE.!

author: Joshua Burke
comment: I use for instant deposit
title: Great app

author: Ben MartinMooney
comment: If I close out of the app (using android) and go to hop back in, the app very briefly shows before disappearing. Have tried restarting the phone, closed the app from my active list, etc. Nothing seems to reset my access besides waiting an undetermined amount of time. Otherwise functionality is great aesthetically, and easy to navigate.
title: App is great except...

author: Juan Journet
comment: Just got an LG Premiere phone my old LG broke and whenever I open the app it goes to a black screen that's it. Running lollipop 5.1

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content: Hello Juan. We've recently released a new version of our app. Please visit the Google Play store on your device to download and install the latest version.

title: Its a great app except I cant use it now

author: Denise LAnier
comment: It just stopped working on my android. I keep getting an authentication error message. Uninstalled and tried to setup again no luck.

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content: Hi Denise. An authentication error message indicates the Sign On ID or password that is being entered may be incorrect. If you are not sure of your Sign On ID or need help with resetting your password, Please call Member Services at 800-431-2754 to help work through your login issues. Thank you

title: Worked good while it lasted

author: Jacqueline McNeill
comment: This app has way too many issues. Every time I try to log in I get a message that the app has stopped. This needs to be fixed immediately
title: App Issues

author: NaTosha Grey
comment: Typing in a password every time is a but cumbersome. I've used other financial apps that offer you to input a 4-digit pin or a security pattern to login. It saves a lot of time and is still secure. I highly recommend this as an upgrade in the very near future!
title: Login process could be simplier!

author: Erika Atkinson
comment: I haven't had any major issues, maybe once or twice. But overall it's great! I transfer money without an issue and deposit checks with ease.
title: Great app

author: brian ferguson
comment: Issues with shutting down eight out of ten times
title: When it works it is fine

author: Necropolis
comment: Pretty cool app, I manage all my accounts and payments. I love usalliance!
title: Nice app

author: Banana Banana Banana Banana Banana
comment: Otherwise nothing really works right.

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content: We're sorry to hear that. We pride ourselves on having a nationally acclaimed app. Can you email some specifics as to what went wrong for you at marketing@usalliance.org. We are anxious to hear your story so we can make it right.

title: I can check my balance I guess.

author: Fazel Lynch
comment: West Indian.
title: Mr. Fazel Lynch

author: victor illa
comment: Won't open, it stopped responding everytime

author: Cutter Thompsom
comment: No problem so far..works great
title: Easy

author: charles schwamberger
comment: WORKS GREAT! THANKS =)

author: Sharonda Townsend
comment: Easy to use

author: Devin Sanchez
comment: It used to work great but ever since upgrading to android 6.0.1 on my Nexus 6P it crashes whenever I try to login.

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content:
Hi Devin,

We have published the update, you should be seeing the update available in the play store within the next few hours.

We are sorry for the inconvenience

title: Crashes when tapping login

author: Joakeem Gaston
comment: This app has worked completely fine but it would be to soon have android pay support. Other than that this app could use a UI update to make it more pleasing to the eye maybe follow material design a little bit but again other than that I haven't experienced any issues with this at all so keep up the great work!
title: Great app but...

author: Marilyn J Hicks
comment: 1⭐! The log in process is too much! To have to put in your ID, password, city you're born in, last 4 of  social is stupid! And, it does NOT refresh from the widget! This app needs lots of work! BTW, I have the latest version!!  During the log in process, I have to answer the security questions each time and the balances don't refresh.

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content:
Hi Marilyn,

Thanks for bringing these issues to our attention.  During the login process are you asked the security questions each time?  If you click the refresh icon on the widget do the accounts get updated?

author: Ryan Feather
comment: Recently it has started saying I have no valid accounts for mobile deposit, and won't display my account information.

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content: Please call Member Services at 800-431-2754 to help work through your mobile deposit issue.

title: When it was working, it was fine

author: Sherron Lynch
comment: I have used this app a total of three times before it told me I have an authentication error. It had also crashed three times in as many days.  I had the prior version which also was also disfunctional, I deleted it and I am sure the same will happen here. There's also no help menu. I uninstalled and reinstalled it but to no avail. I got the same error message. I'm done ...press delete!

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content: Please call Member Services at 800-431-2754 to help work through your authentication error.  Thank you

title: Crash Bandicoot

author: Jason Crawford
comment: This app is better than its predecessor but it still takes an average of 20 minutes for this app to get an acceptable scan of a check. Last night it was 30 minutes. Consider getting an additional account for mobile deposits with another bank if you often need to make mobile deposits. -- Update: The latest update is better.   I usually have to take just one photo of a check for it to work now.

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content: Please update to the latest version which includes camera enhancements for the mobile deposit feature. Thank you.

author: DAVID VOLTA
comment: It Use to remember USER ID with opt To do so & I don't like it asking the same Security questions over & over ! e.g. "Where were you born ?"

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content: At the Login screen: Please enter your User ID then directly underneath select Save. For further assistance please call Member Services on 800-431-2754.

title: Discouraged

author: Crystal Reid
comment: I never really have any issue. But I only use it for simple task.
title: Works pretty good

author: Michael Quinn
comment: My mobile widget with quick balances only updates when I actually login to the app now where before the update my widget would update in real time.  Very irritating

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content: Please download the latest version which contains a Quick Balance bug fix. Thank you.

title: Don't like new update

author: Andrea Pinta
comment: Absolutely love this app. It's simple to use on the go.  It's as if you were in front of the computer managing your account. You can transfer balances, make deposits, pay bills all from this app.  I never really had a problem with it.
title: Great App

author: John Cassidy, Jr.
comment: Have never been able to do a mobile deposit without having to uninstall and reinstall the app
title: Useful for checking balances

author: Bruce Campbell
comment: Great app so far and I'm loving the newest update! Finally can pay my loan from an external account through the app.
title: Very intuitive

author: Harpreet Singh
comment: I love the new app except for the fact I keep crashing everytime I try logging in on my tablet.
title: Great app

author: Ef Haw
comment: Can't update the accounts on the widget without logging on

reply.author: USALLIANCE Financial
reply.content: Please download the latest version which contains a Quick Balance bug fix. Thank you.

author: Michael Corigliano
comment: It does what it needs to very well, but it definitely needs a makeover.

author: Gerri Jones Bennett
comment: Great app gets me where I want to go quickly

author: Michael Miller
comment: And
